sentences.en: Angels of health: angelic healing corps.
sentences.cn: 康复天使: 天使治疗团队.

sentences.en: Different ranges exist on the higher spectrum, such as the Angelic Realm and the Guidance Realm.
sentences.cn: 不同的范围存在较高的光谱, 像是天使的范围和指导的范围.

sentences.en: Every white - robed angelic child carried a candle.
sentences.cn: 每个身穿白色长袍、天使般的小孩都拿了一支蜡烛.

sentences.en: First, the period of his extra - marital affairs were described as intoxicating as wine, holy angelic.
sentences.cn: 他先是把这段婚外情描写得如醇酒般醉人, 天使般圣洁.

sentences.en: He hardened himself against the angelic action and the gentle words of the old man.
sentences.cn: 他对那个老人的仁言懿行还强自抗拒.

sentences.en: Not bad, I still have an angelic heart, kind - hearted, kindheartedness.
sentences.cn: 还好, 我还有一颗天使的心, 善良 、 仁爱.

sentences.en: Shall I send the Angelic hosts to proclaim this or that?
sentences.cn: 我应该派遣天使们去宣布这个或那个?
她脸上绽出天使般的笑容.

sentences.en: She had an angelic smile, but a dreadful temper.
sentences.cn: 她笑起来像个天使，但脾气很可怕。

sentences.en: The pastor escorted Miss Betty Ray in to meet the pseudo - angelic - looking group.
sentences.cn: 贝蒂·雷小姐去见这一群看起来像假天使一样的孩子们的时候,教区牧师亲自为她护驾.

sentences.en: The singer has an angelic voice.
sentences.cn: 那个歌唱家有着天使般的嗓音.

sentences.en: True angelic experiences feel warm, safe, loving, and comfortable.
sentences.cn: 真实的天使经历是温暖, 安全, 充满爱与令人感到舒服的.

sentences.en: Your angelic names are shouting to me in light within this place.
sentences.cn: 在这个地方,你的天使名字正在用光向我欢呼.

trans.tran_cn: 天使的，天国的，（美丽、善良、纯洁等）似天使的
trans.tran_en: looking good, kind, and gentle or behaving in this way
